mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Baker, Abraham
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Whitzel Co., VA [Whitzel County, West Virginia]
Fishing Creek, Whitzel Co., VA [Fishing Creek, Whitzel County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Baker, Abraham Patient Age: 32. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Frost bite, both feet. While carrying a disbatch from Cumberland to Frankford on Monday nigh 1864/12/12. Treatment: Rx saturated salt, alum apploed consistently. Result: Returned to duty.
